pullrequest.title: Task 1: Update satellite colors and wheel directions

content.raw: Thanks for the review and for paying attention to all the aspects. The reason why everything changed is that I had to generate a new world to get the satellite changes in. Sure, I suppose I could have copy/pasted just the satellite into the old world... But in any case, the worlds have changed since the previous release due to other logical changes, so I'm not sure there's much value in manually editing it now...
